input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 8.5' Cashmere Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 7ft Unlit Norwegian Grand Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 14 ft.'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Rockport White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Traditional Green Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman 6.5' Flocked Alaskan Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Artificial Christmas Tree Full Natural Spruce PVC Fir Tree Foldable Metal Stand Unlit Green The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Costway 6Ft Hinged Unlit Artificial Silver Tinsel Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6Ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 61 Pine Cones And 800 Tips The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Bellevue Fraser Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial fir tree with pre-lit features and closely related size, but different 'Feel Real' technology and fir variety.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 8.5' Cashmere Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but slimmer and taller, with different brand and possibly different branch construction and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 7ft Unlit Norwegian Grand Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit fir tree similar in size and construction with detailed branches, same type of fir but different brand and slight height difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 14 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and model line Dunhill Fir tree, larger size but same full construction and features, highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Rockport White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but different tree type (White Pine vs Fir) and possibly different branch style and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Traditional Green Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but different tree species (Spruce), likely different branch tips and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 6.5' Flocked Alaskan Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial tree size but different variety (Alaskan Pine) and flocked type, different brand and possibly different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Artificial Christmas Tree Full Natural Spruce PVC Fir Tree Foldable Metal Stand Unlit Green The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full-bodied artificial fir/spruce tree with foldable metal stand and unlit option, close in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 6Ft Hinged Unlit Artificial Silver Tinsel Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and hinged branches but silver tinsel material significantly differs from natural fir look and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6Ft Unlit Snow-Dusted Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches, 61 Pine Cones And 800 Tips The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit full fir artificial tree with realistic branch tips and similar size, matches closely the reference in terms of features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Bellevue Fraser Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit Fraser Fir tree likely similar branch detail and construction, similar style and unlit feature, same general fir type.
